name: get_forecastdata_by_lat_lon
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool weather_forecast_14_days.
Tool description: weather forecast world wide  14 days 6hourly
API description: Fetches a 14-day weather forecast for a given location specified by latitude and longitude.

lang.description: Language for the forecast data. Defaults to 'en'. It can be one of [en, de, nl, fr, pl, gr, it, cn, ru, cz, pt, es].
